title: Research
text:
Molecules in Strong Magnetic Field
There are some atoms that theoretically and practically do not form bonds in earthly environment. One of the example that we know is helium dimer, i.e. He2. If we consider Molecular Orbital Theory we will see that He2 does not exist.

title: Quarto is Super
text:
What is Quarto?
Quarto is a markup language which can be used to generate beautiful technical or scientific documents.


What can be done with it?
Many things can be done like:

Blogs/Websites
Articles
Presentations
Book

and also one can translate with different kinds of document format like html, pdf, pptx, docx, odt etc. with an ease of simple commands. For more I recommend you to check out the official Quarto website.

title: Raunak Farhaz
text:
I am currently doing my Doctorate in Theoretical Chemistry in Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin. I do method developmentand my primary focus is in the field of Multiresolution Analysis. The former link redirects to one of the review article written by Florian Bischoff on the topic. Nice and easy read.
I love computers and programming. Besides science I love to cook and am an avid music lover.
I love teaching, hence you will find my tutorial videos and lecture notes in the teaching section of this website.
For relevant research collaboration please contact me through my work email or my personal email
